title: In need of a tutor
body:
hey i'm in need of a tutor. i have majority of things down but i'm still pretty bad at the game to be honest (i tend to die too often/soon and i can barely jungle) i was wondering if anyone would be willing to help me out please

thank you for your time

replies.body: You can add me if you want and we can play some. Not sure when I'll next be on this account but it shouldn't be too far away.
